name: Super Squirrels
blurb: An iOS and Android adventure with four Super Squirrels, overcoming challenges and learning how big the world really is.

rewards.reward: \u2022\u2022Bronze Backer\u2022\u2022 Super Squirrels Ad-free on iOS and Android \u2022 Bronze Backer Emblem in-game and on website to show off \u2022 Access to backer updates on game development \u2022 No stretch goal rewards
